EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5325 - Relieve Primary QC Reviewer Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET23_PSA_Relieve Primary QC Reviewer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Primary QC Reviewer Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Primary QC Reviewer listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Primary QC Reviewer is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Primary_QC_Reviewer__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You
